room_title: Escape room "Hoosier Hysteria" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Hoosier Hysteria room was fun. Coco was the best!

room_title: Escape room "Hoosier Hysteria" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: This place is a blast! We had a group of 8 for the Hoosier Hysteria room. Our team was great and we escaped with 12:30 on the clock. Not bad for first timers, I guess. I would definitely do this again. Thank you for a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Hoosier Hysteria" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We had a great time in the Hoosier hysteria room! Our group included three 10 year old boys who throughly enjoyed the entire experience, along with the adults. Ellen was our awesome guide, she was super encouraging and fun! We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Hoosier Hysteria" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We did this for a work/team outing. It was really fun! I want to tell Scott that Shelby was an awesome group leader! :)

room_title: Escape room "Hoosier Hysteria" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Our law firm went there for our Christmas party and we had a great time. We broke up into groups and did all of the rooms. Our room advisor was Brenna who was wonderful. I would highly recommend The Escape Room for office parties and Brenna as your room advisor. Can't wait to come back.
